courseDescription:
Tailored for trainers, this free online course will introduce you to the basics of training programs for organizations and guide you through the techniques of determining training needs. You will learn about the roles of a trainer in creating a great workplace, the requirements of a training system, and the relationship between training, education, and development.

The course will then teach you about determining the necessity and appropriateness of a training program. Also, you will take a look at the concepts and processes of various methods of assessing training needs from job evaluations, performance appraisals, and potential appraisals.

This course on training trainers aims at teaching the importance and techniques of assessing the needs of training programs. This course is aimed at students, researchers, professionals, trainers, and anyone with an interest in developing training programs for organizations. Get started and hone your training knowledge and skills.
